items.title: Type
items.value: Turbo-Thrift, valve-in-head, Single downdraft, Fully synchronous 3-speed manual

items.title: Engine Number Location
items.value: On pad at right side of cylinder block at rear of distributor.

items.title: Lubrication
items.value: Pressure to all bearings excluding wrist pin

items.title: Front
items.value: Independent ball joint with coil springs

items.title: Availability
items.value: All colors may not be available in all models.
